game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Find the lost temple and retrieve the ancient artifact
game.description: A legendary temple has been hidden deep within the jungle for centuries. The powerful artifact inside is said to grant immense power to whoever claims it.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins, a rare potion, and increased reputation

tasks.description: Follow the ancient map to find the hidden path leading to the temple
Use your wits to unlock the temple's main chamber
Face the traps and guardians within the chamber to claim the artifact
